did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This collection contains a letter written to "Mr. Parmmer" (likely Parmer) regarding cattle care.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Parmmer Letter must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Parmmer Letter, Ms2012-054, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This Parmmer Letter was purchased by Special Collections in 2010.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Parmmer Letter was completed in September 2012.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a letter to "Mr. Parmmer," (likely Parmer) regarding the use of poke root, possibly to prevent disease in cattle. It was written in Tazewell County in 1869. The author's name is only partially legible.
